results.title: Auto suggestion
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “This Is Britain”.
Illustrates technical advances in the British motor-car industry showing the fine quality and workmanship of products manufactured. Cars shown include the following: Daimler Straight Eight, Rolls-Royce Silver Wraith, Morris Minor, Vauxhall Wyvern, Austin A40, Hillman Minx, Ford Prefect, Triumph Mayflower, Jaguar XK120 amd Mark VII Saloon, Ford Consul, Triumph Roadster, production version of the 2.1/2 litre Aston Marton, Bristol 401, and the experimental Rover Gas Turbine prototype.

results.title: This Is America

results.title: Golden Gate
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “This Is America”.
San Francisco is the subject of this United States Travel Service program, from the series, “This Is America”. It is a colourful and breezy look at the Californian city which attracts so many tourists annually. Highlights include Fisherman’s Wharf, the Golden Gate Bridge, Chinatown and Alcatraz

results.title: Australia Council archival film series: writers I
results.title_for_label: Australia Council archival film series: writers I

results.title: Gwen Harwood
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Australia Council archival film series: writers I”.
A charming film of poet Gwen Harwood speaking at her home in Tasmania about her work in poetry and her love for music and opera.

group.title: Australia Council archival film series: writers I

results.title: Kylie Tennant
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Australia Council archival film series: writers I”.
Kylie Tennant drew her inspiration from people she knew, and her exuberant interview is in itself a valuable piece of Australian social history.

group.title: Australia Council archival film series: writers I

results.title: John Blight
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Australia Council archival film series: writers I”.
An insightful and humorous conversation with the renowned Queensland poet brimming with anecdotes about the Depression and the development of his poetry.

group.title: Australia Council archival film series: writers I

results.title: Judith Wright
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Australia Council archival film series: writers I”.
As well as being one of Australia’s more eminent poets and novelists, Judith Wright is an outspoken commentator on conservation and Aboriginal land rights.

group.title: Australia Council archival film series: writers I

results.title: Alan Marshall
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Australia Council archival film series: writers I”.
A memorable discussion with an author of extraordinary spirit and charm, who is internationally known for his novel “I Can Jump Puddles”.
